wikipedia_page.main: Glenn Humphries (born 11 August 1964) is an English former footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Doncaster Rovers, Lincoln City, Bristol City, Scunthorpe United and Hull City, and in the Hong Kong First Division League for Golden. He was part of the Doncaster team promoted from the Fourth Division in the 1983–84 season.
